languages.text: "Номос не в когитаторе. И не в сервиторе. Мы не можем сказать, где мы — но наше бытие пока привязано к бытию корабля. Сервитор и когитатор — только... внешние интерфейсы. Оболочки. Как тела у людей".

"Nomos are not in a cogitator. Or in a servitor. We cannot say where we are — but our existence is tied to the existence of the ship for now. The servitor and the cogitator are only... external interfaces. Shells. Like humans and their bodies."
languages.original_text: "Номос не в когитаторе. И не в сервиторе. Мы не можем сказать, где мы — но наше бытие пока привязано к бытию корабля. Сервитор и когитатор — только... внешние интерфейсы. Оболочки. Как тела у людей".

traits.locale_text: "Nomos are not in a cogitator. Or in a servitor. We cannot say where we are — but our existence is tied to the existence of the ship for now. The servitor and the cogitator are only... external interfaces. Shells. Like humans and their bodies."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: «Nomos no estamos en un cogitador. Ni en un servidor. No podemos decir donde estamos, pero nuestra existencia está ligada a la de la nave por ahora. El servidor y el cogitador son... interfaces externas. Cascarones. Como los humanos y sus cuerpos».
languages.original_text: "Nomos are not in a cogitator. Or in a servitor. We cannot say where we are — but our existence is tied to the existence of the ship for now. The servitor and the cogitator are only... external interfaces. Shells. Like humans and their bodies."

traits.locale_text: «Nomos no estamos en un cogitador. Ni en un servidor. No podemos decir donde estamos, pero nuestra existencia está ligada a la de la nave por ahora. El servidor y el cogitador son... interfaces externas. Cascarones. Como los humanos y sus cuerpos».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「ノモスは考算機の中にいない。サーヴィターの中にもいない。我々がどこにいるのかは言えない…だが、我々の存在は今のところ船の存在と結びついている。サーヴィターと考算機は…外部のインターフェイスでしかない。器だ。人間の身体と同じようなもの」
languages.original_text: "Nomos are not in a cogitator. Or in a servitor. We cannot say where we are — but our existence is tied to the existence of the ship for now. The servitor and the cogitator are only... external interfaces. Shells. Like humans and their bodies."

traits.locale_text: 「ノモスは考算機の中にいない。サーヴィターの中にもいない。我々がどこにいるのかは言えない…だが、我々の存在は今のところ船の存在と結びついている。サーヴィターと考算機は…外部のインターフェイスでしかない。器だ。人間の身体と同じようなもの」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “诺莫斯并没有附身在沉思者里，或是机仆身上。我们也说不清楚我们在哪里……但我们的存在，如今正与这艘舰船紧密相联。机仆和沉思者只是……外部接口，或者说外壳，就像人类与他们的肉体的关系一样。”
languages.original_text: "Nomos are not in a cogitator. Or in a servitor. We cannot say where we are — but our existence is tied to the existence of the ship for now. The servitor and the cogitator are only... external interfaces. Shells. Like humans and their bodies."

traits.locale_text: “诺莫斯并没有附身在思考器里，或是奴工身上。我们也说不清楚我们在哪里……但我们的存在，如今正与这艘舰船紧密相联。奴工和思考器只是……外部接口，或者说外壳，就像人类与他们的肉体的关系一样。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « Nous ne sommes pas dans un cogitateur ni dans un servitor. Nous ne pouvons pas dire où nous sommes, mais notre existence est liée à celle du vaisseau, pour le moment. Le servitor et le cogitateur ne sont que des... interfaces externes. Des enveloppes, comme les humains et leurs corps. »
languages.original_text: "Nomos are not in a cogitator. Or in a servitor. We cannot say where we are — but our existence is tied to the existence of the ship for now. The servitor and the cogitator are only... external interfaces. Shells. Like humans and their bodies."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne sommes pas dans un cogitateur ni dans un servitor. Nous ne pouvons pas dire où nous sommes, mais notre existence est liée à celle du vaisseau, pour le moment. Le servitor et le cogitateur ne sont que des... interfaces externes. Des enveloppes, comme les humains et leurs corps. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Nomos sind nicht in einem Cogitator. Oder in einem Servitor. Wir können nicht sagen, wo wir sind. Doch unsere Existenz ist vorerst an die Existenz des Schiffs geknüpft. Der Servitor und der Cogitator sind nur ... externe Schnittstellen. Hüllen. Wie Menschen und ihre Körper."
languages.original_text: "Nomos are not in a cogitator. Or in a servitor. We cannot say where we are — but our existence is tied to the existence of the ship for now. The servitor and the cogitator are only... external interfaces. Shells. Like humans and their bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Nomos sind nicht in einem Cogitator. Oder in einem Servitor. Wir können nicht sagen, wo wir sind. Doch unsere Existenz ist vorerst an die Existenz des Schiffs geknüpft. Der Servitor und der Cogitator sind nur ... externe Schnittstellen. Hüllen. Wie Menschen und ihre Körper."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Nomos, kavramsayarın içinde değil. Hizmetörün bedeninde de değil. Nerede olduğumuzu bilmiyoruz ama varlığımız şimdilik bu gemiye bağlı. Hizmetör ve kavramsayar yalnızca... Dış arayüzümüz. Muhafazamız. İnsanlar ve bedenleri gibi."
languages.original_text: "Nomos are not in a cogitator. Or in a servitor. We cannot say where we are — but our existence is tied to the existence of the ship for now. The servitor and the cogitator are only... external interfaces. Shells. Like humans and their bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Nomos, kavramsayarın içinde değil. Hizmetörün bedeninde de değil. Nerede olduğumuzu bilmiyoruz ama varlığımız şimdilik bu gemiye bağlı. Hizmetör ve kavramsayar yalnızca... Dış arayüzümüz. Muhafazamız. İnsanlar ve bedenleri gibi."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
